title: Why does my end game stats screen take forever to load after finishing on a game?
body: Ever since i got the new client after finishing a game my end game stats take about two minutes to load up and its been annoying me since it happens every single game I play. Any help or way to fix this?

I had the same issue and it is probably one of the most annoying things that can happen.{{item:3070}}   I found out that if you go into options, go to general and turn off "close client during game" its seems to help it load after game much faster although there is still a delay. I hope that helps anyone :)
Same issue with a decent computer,  low spec mode,  and gigabit internet speeds.

Do you guys have your client on "Low-spec mode"?
It causes your client to take around 30s or so to load after a match, as was said in the patch notes.
You should post your pc specs, I don't seem to have the problem, or at least notice it. By memory, I'd even say that the new client loads faster than the old one, but that's anecdotal.

If it's taking a few minutes for your game stats to load, it sounds like your network's connection to our game servers had some kind of hiccup after the match. When you transition from game to the after match lobby, your network has to make a new connection to our servers. 

Since it sounds like you're able to play matches without issues, I wouldn't worry too much, but you can check out our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if you can get a stronger connection so that you can see those epic stats!

Hit me back up if you have any other questions ^_^!
